tool_description: An API of best movies data
name: Best of Movies
title: Best of Movies

api_list.name: Get all the best movies
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all the best movies .
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://best-of-movies.p.rapidapi.com/movies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-of-movies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get the movie by name
api_list.description: This endpoint returns all movies by name or just substring .
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://best-of-movies.p.rapidapi.com/movies/Oppenheimer"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-of-movies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://best-of-movies.p.rapidapi.com/movies/{name}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "best-of-movies.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
